content: I opened a WIP PR for the implementation of the new asm! macro: #69171
It's still incomplete, but I figured it's about time to start getting feedback on the code.
At this point the implementation is 90% complete and can generate code!
Wow! That was quicker than I thought :)

Maybe slow down just a little bit, because technically the project group hasn't been confirmed, so the RFC is even farther from being confirmed, and generally the RFC should be accepted before too much work happens.
All done! :tada:
